question: Write a letter to the local council. In your letterDescribe how the rubbish collection system is not working properlyExplain how this is affecting you and your neighboursSuggest what should be done about the problem.
text: This well-considered letter regards your erroneous thought regarding the cleanliness of the neighbourhood where I live.

The main issue being faced by all residents of the colony is the untimely collection of the garbage done by the cleaning staff. Although they are required to collect the rubbish at 7 am sharp, cleaners are reaching at 8:30 am. As a result, the street dogs and cows are creating a big mess by throwing dirty polybags all around the houses of the people.

Therefore, such activity done by the animals is greatly influencing the health and hygiene of the people residing. Moreover, the foul smell of rotten items scattered by the dogs is increasing the breathing issues in children and old aged people.

As it is said, "Cleanliness is next to godliness" I request you to ask the workers to do their job on time. Furthermore, regular and deep cleaning of the dustbins should also be done so that they do not stink.
We hold high expectations from you and hope you would immediately address this utmost important matter.
